snippet: Josie Harris, the mother of three of Floyd Mayweather Jr.’s children, sued him in Los Angeles Superior Court for defamation over his recent comments about a 2010 domestic violence attack.
abstract: Josie Harris, mother of three of Floyd Mayweather Jr's children, files defamation lawsuit against him over his comments about 2010 domestic violence attack in which he suggested that she was on drugs.
lead_paragraph: Josie Harris, the mother of three of Floyd Mayweather Jr.’s children, sued him in Los Angeles Superior Court for defamation over his recent comments about a 2010 domestic violence attack.
